segments.text: I notice the angled view of this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The right wall has the sink and counter area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in front, unaware of everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's running from the faucet, overflowing steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's streaming down the cabinet fronts to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper cabinets on the left are open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full inside one of them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's climbing the stool to get to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body's stretched, hand inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks unstable, legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's on the floor, arm raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems excited to join in the fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a calm garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and a fence make it look inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, it's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
